title: Harry S Truman National Historic Site: Safety
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety            Safety       Harry S Truman National Historic Site, like any historical or natural environment, contains certain inherent hazards that could spoil your visit. The following precautions should be practiced to avoid accidents. General Safety Call 911 for any emergency.  Dress appropriately for the weather. Drink plenty of fluids during hot summer weather Tour Safety Use caution on porches and steps throughout the house Slippery Walkways Walkways in the historic area can be slippery in wet or freezing weather. Severe Weather Seek shelter indoors or in a low place when thunderstorms approach. Follow the instructions of park staff during severe weather.
